description: Molien series of 2-dimensional representation of SL(2,3).
comments: Apart from initial term(s), dimension of the space of weight 2n cuspidal newforms for Gamma_0( 2 ).
references: D. J. Benson, Polynomial Invariants of Finite Groups, Cambridge, 1993, p. 100.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
William A. Stein, Dimensions of the spaces S_k^{new}(Gamma_0(N))
William A. Stein, The modular forms database
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,1,1,0,-1).
formula: a(n) = a(n-2)+a(n-3)-a(n-5). G.f.: (x^4-x^2+1) / ((x-1)^2*(x+1)*(x^2+x+1)). - _Colin Barker_, Jan 07 2014a(n) ~ n/6 (first difference is 6-periodic). - _Ralf Stephan_, Apr 29 2014a(n) = 2*floor(n/3)-n/2+(3+(-1)^n)/4. - _Tani Akinari_, Oct 23 2014
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(x^4 - x^2 + 1)/((x - 1)^2 (x + 1) (x^2 + x + 1)), {x, 0, 100}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 23 2014 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
